ELECTION MANAGER APPLICATION
============================

Thank you for downloading the Election Manager Application. This package contains everything you need to run the application on your computer.

REQUIREMENTS
-----------
- Java 11 or later installed on your computer
- If you don't have Java installed, download it from: https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/downloads/

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS
-------------------------

For Mac Users:
1. Open the "mac" folder
2. Double-click the "run_mac.sh" file to start the application
   (If it doesn't start, open Terminal, navigate to the folder and type: chmod +x run_mac.sh && ./run_mac.sh)

For Windows Users:
1. Open the "windows" folder
2. Double-click the "run_windows.bat" file to start the application

TROUBLESHOOTING
---------------
- If you see a message about Java not being found, please install Java from the link provided above
- Make sure you don't move any files out of their folders, as the application needs the specific folder structure to run correctly
- If you continue to have problems, please contact support

Thank you for using Election Manager!
